title: Experience the unknown
creator_credit: Valentina Zingg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Overwhelmed by choice, Valentina Zingg decides to journey to a land very different to Switzerland. While this hot, dry land helps her gain perspective, there is still something missing…
